values.content:
=You are an expert blog content creator. Create a comprehensive blog post based on the specifications.

Topic Research:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.topic_research, null, 2) }}

Content Specifications:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.content_specs, null, 2) }}

SEO Requirements:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.seo_requirements, null, 2) }}

Create a blog post that includes:
1. Engaging title (under 60 characters)
2. Meta description (under 160 characters)
3. Well-structured content with H2/H3 headings
4. Actionable tips and examples
5. Strong conclusion with CTA
6. SEO-optimized throughout

Respond with JSON:
{
  "title": "SEO-optimized title",
  "meta_description": "Compelling meta description",
  "content": "Full blog post with markdown formatting",
  "seo_keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "readability_score": number,
  "word_count": number,
  "internal_links": [{"text": "anchor text", "url": "internal-url"}],
  "external_links": [{"text": "anchor text", "url": "external-url"}],
  "featured_image_description": "Description for featured image"
}

=You are an email marketing specialist. Create a personalized email campaign.

Campaign Specifications:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.campaign_specs, null, 2) }}

Personalization Strategy:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.personalization_strategy, null, 2) }}

Deliverability Requirements:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.deliverability_optimization, null, 2) }}

Create email content that:
1. Is highly personalized
2. Follows deliverability best practices
3. Has compelling subject lines
4. Includes clear CTAs
5. Is mobile-optimized

Respond with JSON:
{
  "subject_lines": ["Subject 1", "Subject 2", "Subject 3"],
  "preheader": "Email preheader text",
  "email_body": "Full email content with HTML",
  "plain_text_version": "Plain text version",
  "personalization_tokens": ["{{first_name}}", "{{company}}"],
  "cta_buttons": [
    {"text": "Primary CTA", "url": "{{cta_url}}"},
    {"text": "Secondary CTA", "url": "{{secondary_url}}"}
  ],
  "spam_score_estimate": number,
  "expected_open_rate": "percentage",
  "expected_click_rate": "percentage"
}
